title: Defining Modules to Control Scope and Privacy
description: In this lab, we will learn about modules and how they allow us to organize code within a crate, control the privacy of items, and provide a way to navigate the module tree.

meta.title: Defining Modules to Control Scope and Privacy | Rust Programming
meta.description: Learn how to organize your Rust code with modules, control privacy, and navigate the module tree in this comprehensive programming tutorial.
meta.keywords: Rust, Modules, Scope, Privacy, Code Organization, Programming Tutorial
